mapper.select: SELECT sp.session_pass_name AS sessionPassName, csp.remaining_count AS remainingCount, csp.expiration_date AS expirationDate FROM customer_session_pass csp JOIN session_pass sp ON csp.session_pass_id = sp.session_pass_id WHERE csp.customer_id = #{customerId} AND csp.expiration_date IS NOT NULL AND csp.deleted_at IS NULL AND sp.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY csp.expiration_date ASC
